_deposit(uint256,uint256).details: Internal notation used as only callable internally by `authorized`.

_withdraw(uint256,uint256).details: Internal notation used as only callable internally by `authorized`.

params.token: Address of token to fetch rewards of

returns._0: Amount of token earned in rewards

getPriorBalanceIndex(uint256,uint256).details: Block number must be a finalized block or else this function will revert to prevent misinformation.

params.timestamp: The timestamp to get the balance at
params.tokenId: The token of the NFT to check

returns._0: The balance the account had as of the given block

params.timestamp: The timestamp to get the index at

getReward(uint256,address[]).details: Called by VotingEscrow to retrieve locked rewards

params.tokens: Array of tokens to claim rewards of

notifyRewardAmount(address,uint256).details: Called by VotingEscrow to add rebases / compounded rewards for disbursement

params.amount: Amount of token to transfer to rewards

_deposit(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit an amount into the rewards contract to earn future rewards associated to a veNFT

_withdraw(uint256,uint256).notice: Withdraw an amount from the rewards contract associated to a veNFT

checkpoints(uint256,uint256).notice: A record of balance checkpoints for each account, by index

earned(address,uint256).notice: Calculate how much in rewards are earned for a specific token and veNFT

getPriorBalanceIndex(uint256,uint256).notice: Determine the prior balance for an account as of a block number

getPriorSupplyIndex(uint256).notice: Determine the prior index of supply staked by of a timestamp

getReward(uint256,address[]).notice: Claim the rewards earned by a veNFT staker

isReward(address).notice: True if a token is or has been an active reward token, else false

lastEarn(address,uint256).notice: Most recent timestamp a veNFT has claimed their rewards

notifyRewardAmount(address,uint256).notice: Add rewards for stakers to earn

numCheckpoints(uint256).notice: The number of checkpoints for each tokenId deposited

supplyCheckpoints(uint256).notice: A record of balance checkpoints for each token, by index

tokenRewardsPerEpoch(address,uint256).notice: Amount of tokens to reward depositors for a given epoch

documentation.text:
@inheritdoc ManagedReward
 @dev Called by VotingEscrow to retrieve locked rewards

@inheritdoc ManagedReward
 @dev Called by VotingEscrow to add rebases / compounded rewards for disbursement

@notice Stores rewards that are max-locked (i.e. rebases / tokens that were compounded)
 @dev Rewards are distributed based on weight contribution to managed nft
